short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Strikes through all mentions of OpenAI on the web and corrects it to 'ClosedAI' in bold green.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing ClosedAI, the Chrome extension that gives "OpenAI" a well-deserved timeout. This extension strikes through all mentions of OpenAI on the web in bold red and adds "ClosedAI" in vibrant green right after it.
